name: Racing Ridge: Huckleberry Hills (Inky Factory Games)

description:
The first track in the Racing Ridge series: Huckleberry Hills!

»»» News »»»
- This is a DODGING game!

»»» Racing Ridge! »»
Use the arrow keys to move the car!

»»» Update Information »»»
[ 1.0 ] December 20, 2020
- Initial Release

»»» Music (in order) »»»
- RadioCutter by Waterflame
- Show Time by Waterflame
- ThugBeat by Waterflame & Racing Apex

»»» Programs Used »»»
- Scratch: Game logic
- Blender 3D: Track and car designs/textures
- Paint.net: Blur effects/titles & buttons
- MediaHuman: Song and sound effect downloads

»»» Other Stuff »»»
- Coin rewards are determined by this math formula:
ROUND((10 - (finishing time²) * 100)
- Yes, the cave entrance part on Huckleberry Hills is possible
without dying :)
- The max amount of coins is 99,999
